episodes.title: 244 ❤️‍🩹 Narcissistic Abuse: Vanessa Reiser on Identifying and Escaping Toxic Relationships
episodes.description: In this eye-opening episode of The Midlife Makeover Show, host Wendy Valentine welcomes Vanessa Reiser, author, entrepreneur, psychotherapist, and advocate for raising awareness about narcissistic abuse. Vanessa specializes in narcissistic and cult abuse, dedicating her life to helping people escape and heal from toxic relationships. Featured in prominent media outlets like People magazine, the New York Times, and Fox News, Vanessa joins us to share her expertise and insights. Dive into the complex world of narcissistic abuse as Wendy and Vanessa explore Vanessa's new book, "Narcissistic Abuse: How to Identify, Escape, and Heal from Manipulative, Toxic People." Discover the tactics used by narcissists, such as gaslighting, love bombing, and triangulating, and learn how to spot, avoid, and recover from these destructive relationships. Vanessa sheds light on the characteristics of narcissism, the challenges of identifying it, and the importance of empathy in our culture. Vanessa also shares her personal journey and the inspiration behind her advocacy work. From running across New York State in a wedding dress to highlight the manipulation of narcissists, to providing practical advice on healing and self-care, this episode is filled with valuable insights and support for anyone affected by narcissistic abuse. 👉 Connect with Vanessa tellatherapist.net @vanessareiserlcsw 🎙 Listen to the Podcast http://themidlifemakeovershow.com 🧘‍♀️ Get the FREEDOM Meditations https://freedommeditations.com 🤩 Join the FREEDOM at Midlife Program http://freedomatmidlife.com 📕 Join the Women Waking Up Waitlist https://wendyvalentine.com/book 🦸‍♀️ Take the Superhero Quiz http://mysuperheroquiz.com 😊 All the Midlife Goods https://wendyvalentine.com 🎥 Subscribe to my YouTube channel http://midlifemakeoveryoutube.com 💥 Follow me on IG https://www.instagram.com/wendy_valentine_/ 🥰 Get Your Free Happiness Hacks http://wendyvalentine.com/happiness 🛍️ Shop my Amazon Store http://amazon.wendyvalentine.com 🎤Nominate a Guest http://midlifemakeoverguest.com ⭐️ Leave a 5 Star Review http://reviewtheshow.com 🗞 Get The Midlife News http://themidlifenews.com ❤️ Join the Club http://themidlifemakeoverclub.com
